scripts.coveralls:push: cat ./coverage/lcov.info | npm_config_yes=true npx coveralls || echo 'coveralls push failed :(' && exit 0
scripts.docs: yarn workspaces foreach -p run docs && touch ./docs/.nojekyll || exit 0
scripts.postupdate: yarn && npx browserslist@latest --update-db && npx yarn-audit-fix && yarn build && yarn test
